alert.note: Alert for Eastern Columbia; Eastern Rensselaer; Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Greene; Western Schenectady; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 3:21AM EST until January 24 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of less than one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Northern Litchfield County in northwestern Connecticut, western Massachusetts and the eastern Catskills, Helderbergs, northern and central Taconics and Schoharie County in eastern New York. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mixed precipitation, including freezing rain, will change over to plain rain by this evening as temperatures rise above freezing.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Columbia; Eastern Rensselaer; Schoharie; Western Albany; Western Greene; Western Schenectady; Western Ulster
